content:
# The furnace has successfully produced 1 iron plate and still has 8 iron ore left. However, it appears that I no longer have any coal left in my inventory to insert into the furnace.
# This indicates that the furnace has consumed all available coal during the smelting process.

# To continue, I need to gather more coal. Let's find a nearby coal resource and harvest some.

coal_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)  # Finding the nearest coal resource
move_to(coal_position)  # Moving to the coal resource position
harvest_resource(coal_position, quantity=10)  # Harvesting additional coal

# After harvesting, I will check the inventory to see the results.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Inspecting the updated inventory after harvesting coal

# Once I have gathered coal, I will return to the furnace and insert it to continue smelting the remaining iron ore into plates. 
# Then, I will check the furnace status again.
